ca.ualberta.cs.cmput301t02project.activity

Class BrowseTopLevelCommentsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.cmput301t02project.activity.BrowseTopLevelCommentsActivity

  • public class BrowseTopLevelCommentsActivity
extends Activity
    Displays comments top level comments (aka. comments with no parents, comments that are not replies to anything). A list of all top level comments is stored in ProjectApplication.
